title: Man asks Karan Johar for his WhatsApp number on Twitter, KJo's reply will make you go LOL! | Zee News
text:
Man asks Karan Johar for his WhatsApp number on Twitter, KJo's reply will make you go LOL! By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Sunday, February 26, 2017 - 12:08 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar is known for his wit and humour. The 44-year-old star never fails to entertain his followers with interesting tweets. The 'Student Of The Year' director did something similar on Saturday when a man asked for his WhatsApp number online. 
All this happened when Kjo was conducting a chat session with his fans on the Internet. This is when a Twitter user requested Karan's contact details. 
"Sure and my bank account details?? You don't want that " he replied. Sure and my bank account details?? You don't want that https://t.co/UTYiQrfPdp 
â€” Karan Johar (@karanjohar) 25 February 2017 
ROFL! This is why you should never mess with Karan. MUST READ 
On the professional front, he is currently enjoying the Box Office success of his last release 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil'. Karan can also be seen hosting popular television talk show 'Koffee With Karan' season 5. First Published: Sunday, February 26, 2017 - 12:08 More from zeenews
